attributes.action: RESIST any attempts to levy VAT on goods/services supplied from non-EU countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
VAT is an EU tax. Thus it can only ever apply to goods/services supplied by EU countries.
Some USA Websites attempt to charge VAT. While this in itself is wrong as the address on the invoice is outside the EU, they also ignore EU VAT registration numbers.
I even hear that specific wording now has to be put on invoices to Switzerland (another non-EU country)!
